流式接口​

Operations​

POST/download_file_streamPOST/upload_file_stream

下载文件流​

POST
/download_file_stream

以流式方式从网络或本地下载文件

Request Body​

application/json
JSON
{
"file": "http://example.com/file.png"
}

Responses​

业务响应

application/json
JSON
{
"status": "ok",
"retcode": 0,
"data": {
"type": "stream",
"data_type": "file_info",
"file_name": "file.png",
"file_size": 1024
},
"message": "",
"wording": ""
}
POST
/download_file_stream

Playground​

Body

Samples​

cURL
JavaScript
PHP
Python

上传文件流​

POST
/upload_file_stream

以流式方式上传文件数据到机器人

Request Body​

application/json
JSON
{
"stream_id": "uuid-1234-5678",
"chunk_data": "SGVsbG8gV29ybGQ=",
"chunk_index": 0,
"total_chunks": 1,
"file_size": 11
}

Responses​

业务响应

application/json
JSON
{
"status": "ok",
"retcode": 0,
"data": {
"type": "stream",
"stream_id": "uuid-1234-5678",
"status": "chunk_received",
"received_chunks": 1,
"total_chunks": 1
},
"message": "",
"wording": ""
}
POST
/upload_file_stream

/get_group_detail_info

{

}

业务响应

application/json
JSON
{
"status": "ok",
"retcode": 0,
"data": {
"group_id": 123456,
"group_name": "测试群",
"member_count": 100,
"max_member_count": 500
},
"message": "",
"wording": ""
}
